text.tspan: 2017-03-20 04:42:12 +0800u000anpmdoc - tweak nodei.co icon to buildNpmdoc target
2017-03-20 01:47:36 +0800u000a- add env var npm_package_buildNpmdocMain to customize npmdoc targ\
2017-03-20 01:00:39 +0800u000a- security - rewrite function moduleDirname, so that it doesn't ha\
2017-03-19 20:29:06 +0800u000a- security - disable requiring arbitrary modules in function modul\
2017-03-19 17:09:20 +0800u000a- add env var TRAVIS_REPO_CREATE_FORCE to force re-creation of npm\
- add optional commit-message for PUT and DELETE requests in github-crud
- add shell-function shNpmdocRepoCreateAndPush to automate creation of npmdoc's
- shBuildPrint message for deprecate and publish operations
- allow auto-deprecating of aliases in publish branch
- allow auto-publishing of aliases in publish branch
- automate building and publishing of npmdoc's
- commit tag 'npm publish' will publish package in alpha-branch and promote to beta
- remove '|| return $?' from shell-scripts when possible to fix 'set -e' failing to exit on erro\
- partially revert npm_package_nameAlias back to npm_package_name
- split function buildApidoc into new file lib.apidoc.js
- build - auto-clean build if commit-message is CLEAN_BUILD
- build - auto-tag branch in master build-branch
- promote utility2 plug in README.md, api-doc, code-coverage, rollup, test-coverage
- replace env var npm_package_name with npm_package_nameAlias in istanbul code-coverage
- do not auto-uglify js-assets in production
- revamp function buildReadme and include testCase_buildReadme_default inside testCase_buildApp_\
- use env var npm_package_nameAlias over npm_package_name
- allow env var npm_config_mode_test_case to have comma-separated list of test-cases
- rename base64 functions with base64 as prefix
- merge files lib.* into standaalone file assets.utility2.rollup.js
2017-01-27 14:44:40 +0800u000a- move most logic from Dockerfile.latest to Dockerfile.base
- automate readme-generation with new functions local.buildReadmeElectronLite and local.buildRea\
- add modeDebug option to function local.ajax
- merge utility2 namespace into local namespace
- revamp encryption features to primarily use json-web-encryption
- use 'local' as primary namespace for tests
- add webkit-polyfill for TextDecoder and TextEncoder
- coverage - add in-file config-var /* istanbul ignore all */ to ignore the file
- coverage - add env-variable npm_config_mode_coverage_append to allow appending coverage to pre\
- coverage - change behavior of npm_config_mode_coverage=all to cover all files
- function utility2.replStart - make it a standalone function
- function utility2.uglify - prefer uglifying code with 80-column-width
- fix utility2.errorDefault getting its stack prepended
- merge functions utility2.taskOnTaskUpsert and utility2.taskOnErrorPush -> utility2.taskCreate
- README.md - replace alpha api-doc with beta api-doc
- cull testCase_xxx properties in function docApiCreate
- auto-default null / undefined arguments to empty object {} in utility2.objectSetDefault and ut\
- prevent potential infinite recursion bug in function utility2.onNext
- migrate nedb-api from swagger-lite to utility2
- allow repl-server to be accessed remotely via tcp
- add coverage option to command 'utility2 start'
- rename functions in jslint, stateInit, tasks
- allow packages that don't depend on utility2 to be built by it
- fix coverage-key collision bug in istanbul instrumenter
- explicitly require the macro /* istanbul instrument in package ... */ for a file to be covered
- merge shell function shReadmeExportScripts into shInit
- deploy standalone app to heroku test-server
- add 'run internal test' button in webpage
- add env var npm_config_mode_backend to disable utility2.serverLocalUrlTest
- add download link for example.js and example.sh in README.md
- add homepage-link in test-page, test-report, coverage-report
- move shell function shDocApiCreate to javascript function testCase_build_doc
- split function utility2.onReady into utility2.onReadyBefore and utility2.onReadyAfter
- jslint - remove hacky es6 generator support
- add functions utility2.cookieDict, utility2.cookieRemove, utility2.cookieRemoveAll, utility2.c\
- allow argument for arbitrary string method in utility2.templateRender
2016-05-07 14:59:43 +0300u000a- fix utility2.FormData.prototype.append from crashing when it tri\
es to set value.name to a browser file-object
- function utility2.jslintAndPrint - add css support for flexbox
- use handlebars-like syntax each/if/unless in utility2.templateRender
